Package com.Game

Class DataBaseHandler

java.lang.Object
com.Game.DataBaseHandler
public class DataBaseHandler extends Object
Class that stores all the methods needed for a completely working database. Global behaviour.

    • setCompletion

      public static void setCompletion(Connection conn, String levelName)
      Function to set the completion inside the database. When we finish a level, small bug that shows 99% completion. This gets rid of it.
      Parameters:
      conn - connection to the database
      levelName - name of the level
